resources.string:
Thank you for using Heroclix Rules! Please donate and support us in making other great Heroclix apps.
This little application is aimed to make it easier for you to look up the different rules for the game HeroClix. We've listed nearly all the rules.

You navigate by using you finger to scroll the list. Click an element to see the ruling. You can also scroll the bottom bar (from right to left).

Please rate and comment. If you find any bugs please report back to us at heroclix@fifthfloorstudio.net. You can also send us an e-mail if you have other inquiries.

Rules was updated 15.06.13
Thank to Cristina Gómez González and Vinx Rockstansky for translating the app to Spanish
Heroclix is a trademark of WizKids/NECA, LLC.
Thank you for considering donating. Press \'okey\' to open your browser and be redirected to Paypal.com.
